properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT VIDEO_NO, MEM_NO, VIDEO_TITLE, CHANNEL_NAME, VIDEO_ADDRESS FROM TB_COU_VIDEO ORDER BY VIDEO_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT VIDEO_NO, MEM_NO, VIDEO_TITLE, CHANNEL_NAME, VIDEO_ADDRESS FROM TB_COU_VIDEO WHERE VIDEO_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_COU_VIDEO SET VIDEO_TITLE = ?, CHANNEL_NAME = ?, VIDEO_ADDRESS = ? WHERE VIDEO_NO = ?
SELECT VIDEO_NO, MEM_NO, VIDEO_TITLE, CHANNEL_NAME, VIDEO_ADDRESS FROM TB_COU_VIDEO

SELECT ROUND(AVG(COU_SCOPE),1), COU_NO, HOS_NAME, COU_NAME, PHONE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, PROFILE_PATH, PRICE FROM TB_COU JOIN TB_HOSPITAL USING(HOS_NO) JOIN TB_COU_REV USING(COU_NO) GROUP BY COU_NO, HOS_NAME, COU_NAME, PHONE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, PROFILE_PATH, PRICE ORDER BY COU_NAME
SELECT COU_NO, HOS_NAME, COU_NAME, PHONE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, PROFILE_PATH, PRICE FROM TB_COU JOIN TB_HOSPITAL USING(HOS_NO) WHERE COU_NO = ?
SELECT DISTINCT COU_DATE FROM TB_COU_TIME WHERE COU_NO = ?
SELECT TIME_NO, COU_NO, COU_TIME, COU_DATE FROM TB_COU_TIME WHERE COU_NO = ? AND COU_DATE = ? AND COU_TIME NOT IN( SELECT RES_TIME FROM TB_COU_RES WHERE COU_NO = ? AND RES_DATE = ? ) ORDER BY TIME_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COU_RES WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND COU_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_COU_REV VALUES ( SEQ_COU_REV_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )
SELECT REV_NO, COU_NO, NICKNAME, REV_CONTENT, CR.CREATE_DATE, COU_SCOPE FROM TB_COU_REV CR JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE COU_NO = ? ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COU_REV WHERE COU_NO = ? AND MEM_NO = ?
SELECT CAR_NO, COU_NO, CAR_CONTENT FROM TB_COU_CAR WHERE COU_NO = ?
